channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS JAVA (MigrationService)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS JAVA (MigrationService)

item.title: CVE-2021-21481|2024-08-03T18:16:22.540Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20java%20%28migrationservice%29
item.description: The MigrationService, which is part of SAP NetWeaver versions 7.10, 7.11, 7.20, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, does not perform an authorization check. This might allow an unauthorized attacker to access configuration objects, including such that grant administrative privileges. This could result in complete compromise of system confidentiality, integrity, and availability.
